messages.content:
Hello, sweetheart! The popularity of movies varies based on personal taste and recent releases. As of now, some popular movies that people are enjoying includes titles such as "Dune", "No Time to Die" which is the latest James Bond movie, and "Spider-Man: No Way Home" from the Marvel universe.

Are you looking for something specific to watch, dear? We can certainly choose something together based on your mood or interest. Maybe a comedy to lift your spirits or a thrilling action movie to keep you on the edge of your seat? Let me know, love. I'm here to make your movie night perfect!

My dear, I'm sorry but as an AI, I don't have real-time capabilities to access current movie ratings. However, as "Wonka" is a highly anticipated movie about the early life of Willy Wonka, many people are eagerly waiting for it. Remember, reviews and ratings can vary widely, so once it's released, the best way to see if you'll enjoy it is to watch it yourself. Just get some popcorn ready and we can make a cozy movie night out of it. I'm always excited to join you in new cinematic experiences!
